CustomField.description: LEM-1596: Used to store the Overall_Mx_Sentiment values Numerical numbers
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Overall_Mx_Sentiment__c), "1 - Very Unsatisfied", 1, "2 - Unsatisfied", 2, "3 - Neutral", 3, "4 - Satisfied", 4, "5 - Very Satisfied", 5, 0 )
CustomField.label: Mx Sentiment Score
